content:
Hi,

I stumbled upon your article while searching how the hell we should create a user in an Azure SQL database via DevOps. As none of the options seem to work. 'Authenticate' property unsupported in powershell 5 and up. Integrated security uses agent identity instead of service connection and a sql user just isn't allowed to run the 'from external provider'
I see you use an EXE for this. Is this EXE part of your build and you run it from the azure agent if I read it correctly?
